TEXT.English: DAWN OF A CIVILIZATION
TEXT.French: DAWN OF A CIVILIZATION
TEXT.German: DAWN OF A CIVILIZATION
TEXT.Italian: DAWN OF A CIVILIZATION
TEXT.Spanish: DAWN OF A CIVILIZATION

TEXT.English: It is the year 1776 AD. Discontent with foreign domination, the people in the American colonies have risen up in revolution to found their own nation. However, their fledgling republic is still in danger of being reclaimed by European colonial powers and has to surpass its former masters to fulfill its manifest destiny.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1776 ap. J.-C. Le mécontentement face à la domination étrangère a poussé le peuple des colonies américaines à prendre les armes afin de fonder une nouvelle nation. La jeune république demeure toutefois en danger d'être reconquise par les puissance coloniales européennes, et doit surpasser ses anciens maîtres afin d'accomplir son destin manifeste.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1776 AD. Discontent with foreign domination, the people in the American colonies have risen up in revolution to found their own nation. However, their fledgling republic is still in danger of being reclaimed by European colonial powers and has to surpass its former masters to fulfill its manifest destiny.

TEXT.English: It is the year 622 AD. The founding of Islam unites the Arabian people under the banner of the Caliphate. Arabia's direct neighbors, the Byzantine Empire and Sassanid Persia, are weakened from their recent wars. It is the right time to expand the House of Islam into their wealthy possessions, forming a melting pot of cultures that will bring culture and science to new heights.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 622 ap. J.-C. La fondation de l'islam permet d'unir les peuples d'Arabie sous la bannière du califat. Les voisins immédiats des Arabes, l'Empire byzantin et la Perse sassanide, sont affaiblis par leurs guerres récentes. Le moment est idéal pour propager l'islam à travers leurs contrées riches et ainsi créer un mélange de cultures capable d'emmener les arts et les sciences vers de nouveaux sommets.
TEXT.German: It is the year 622 AD. The founding of Islam unites the Arabian people under the banner of the Caliphate. Arabia's direct neighbors, the Byzantine Empire and Sassanid Persia, are weakened from their recent wars. It is the right time to expand the House of Islam into their wealthy possessions, forming a melting pot of cultures that will bring culture and science to new heights.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1810 AD. Spurred by the weakness of the Spanish Empire and the ideals of the French Revolution, the people in the Viceroyalty of the Rio de la Plata have overthrown their viceroy and started a revolution to form the Argentine Republic.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1810 ap. J.-C. Encouragé par la faiblesse de l'Empire espagnol et les idéaux de la Révolution française, le peuple de la Vice-royauté du Río de la Plata a renversé son vice-roi et lancé une révolution afin de créer la République argentine.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1810 AD. Spurred by the weakness of the Spanish Empire and the ideals of the French Revolution, the people in the Viceroyalty of the Rio de la Plata have overthrown their viceroy and started a revolution to form the Argentine Republic.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1850 AD. The Australian Colonies Government Act has just been signed, granting representative constitutions to the colony. The mineral riches of the land can provide the base of a well developed empire.
TEXT.French: No Translation
TEXT.German: No Translation
TEXT.Italian: No Translation
TEXT.Spanish: No Translation

TEXT.English: It is the year 1195 AD. The Aztec peoples have founded the city of Tenochtitlan at Lake Texcoco in the Valley of Mexico. Through clever use of irrigation systems, Tenochtitlan can become the largest metropolis of Mesoamerica and dominate the surrounding cities.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1195 ap. J.-C. Le peuple aztèque a fondé la ville de Tenochtitlan sur le lac Texcoco dans la vallée de Mexico. Grâce à d'ingénieux systèmes d'irrigation, Tenochtitlan peut devenir la plus grande métropole de Mésoamérique et dominer les cités-États environnantes.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1195 AD. The Aztec peoples have founded the city of Tenochtitlan at Lake Texcoco in the Valley of Mexico. Through clever use of irrigation systems, Tenochtitlan can become the largest metropolis of Mesoamerica and dominate the surrounding cities.

TEXT.English: It is the year 3000 BC. The fertile crescent of Mesopotamia is home of the first urbanized cultures in the history of mankind and known as the cradle of civilization. Though the cities of Sumer and Akkad are thriving, with the emergence of Babylon, they will soon be overshadowed by the greatest metropolis of its time.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 3000 av. J.-C. Le croissant fertile, en Mésopotamie, voit se développer les premières sociétés urbaines de l'histoire de l'humanité. Dans ce berceau de la civilisation, les villes de Sumer et d'Akkad sont prospères, mais elles seront bientôt éclipsées par la métropole la plus grande et la plus importante de son temps : Babylone.
TEXT.German: It is the year 3000 BC. The fertile crescent of Mesopotamia is home of the first urbanized cultures in the history of mankind and known as the cradle of civilization. Though the cities of Sumer and Akkad are thriving, with the emergence of Babylon, they will soon be overshadowed by the greatest metropolis of its time.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1852 AD. The discord between governers and settlers about colony politics lead settlers to move out from their colonies. Boer republics declared independence and get recognized by former governers, but the political and diplomatic conditions against European imperialists are still unstable. The Boer peoples' bright future is not guaranted yet.
TEXT.French: No Translation
TEXT.German: No Translation
TEXT.Italian: No Translation
TEXT.Spanish: No Translation

TEXT.English: It is the year 1822 AD. After the revolution in Portugal threatens Brazilian sovereignty within the United Kingdom, Dom Pedro of Brazil declares an independent empire. Brazil's rich plantations as well as the Amazon rainforest promise wealth for the future, but also demand preservation.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1822 ap. J.-C. La révolution libérale au Portugal menace la souveraineté brésilienne au sein du Royaume-Uni de Portugal, du Brésil et des Algarves. Pierre, régent du Brésil, déclare l'indépendance de l'ancienne colonie et devient son premier empereur. Les plantations fertiles et la forêt équatoriale amazonienne promettent un avenir prospère au Brésil, mais nécessitent aussi d'être préservées.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1822 AD. After the revolution in Portugal threatens Brazilian sovereignty with in the United Kingdom, Dom Pedro of Brazil declares an independent empire. Brazil's rich plantations as well as the Amazon rainforest promise wealth for the future, but also demand preservation.

TEXT.English: It is the year 330 AD. With the Roman Empire threatened by Barbarian invasions from the east, it becomes evident that the Empire cannot be governed from Rome alone. So Constantine the Great has founded Constantinopolis as a "New Rome", in hopes that the Eastern Empire will be able to withstand these incursions and eventually restore the glory of the Roman Empire.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 330 ap. J.-C. Les invasions barbares menacent l'Empire romain sur ses frontières orientales, et il devient évident que le gouvernement ne peut plus être exercé depuis Rome seule. Sur les rives du Bosphore, Constantin le Grand fonde Constaninople en tant que nouvelle capitale. L'Empire d'Orient saura-t-il résister aux incursions étrangères et restaurer, à terme, la gloire de l'Empire romain?
TEXT.German: It is the year 330 AD. With the Roman Empire threatened by Barbarian invasions from the east, it becomes evident that the Empire cannot be governed from Rome alone. So Constantine the Great has founded Constantinopolis as a "New Rome", in hopes that the Eastern Empire will be able to withstand these incursions and eventually restore the glory of the Roman Empire.

TEXT.English: It is the year 600 AD. After the death of Justinian, most of his successes have been unmade again. While the Lombards took Northern Italy and the Danube could be barely held against the Slavs, Byzantium was also plunged into a war against Sassanid Persia. Its victory proved Pyrrhic, and now the Empire is economically and militarily weakened.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 600 ap. J.-C. Les succès accomplis par Justinien n'ont guère duré après sa mort. Tandis que les Lombards envahissaient l'Italie du Nord et et que le Danube résistait à peine aux incursions slaves, Byzance a été plongée dans une guerre contre la Perse sassanide. La victoire remportée l'a été au prix de terribles pertes, et l'Empire se trouve désormais affaibli sur les plans économique et militaire.
TEXT.German: It is the year 600 AD. After the death of Justinian, most of his successes have been unmade again. While the Lombards took Northern Italy and the Danube could be barely held against the Slavs, Byzantium was also plunged into a war against Sassanid Persia. TEXT.English: It is the year 1867. After the American revolution, Canada has remained under colonial control. With the approval of the North America Acts, Canada has now been finally granted independence so it can expand across the Great White North on its own accord.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1867 ap. J.-C. Après la révolution américaine, le Canada est demeuré sous domination coloniale. L'Acte d'Amérique de Nord lui donne aujourd'hui l'indépendance nécessaire pour prendre de l'expansion à travers le nord du continent.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1867. After the American revolution, Canada has remained under colonial control. With the approval of the North America Acts, Canada has now been finally granted independence so it can expand across the Great White North on its own accord.

TEXT.Spanish: It is the year 1867. After the American revolution, Canada has remained under colonial control. With the approval of the North America Acts, Canada has now been finally granted independence so it can expand across the Great White North on its own accord.

TEXT.English: It is the year 2070 BC. China is the easternmost region of the world where human civilization first develops. Through the dynasties of Xia, Shang and Zhou, cities develop mainly in the vicinity of the Yellow River, and the concept of a "Mandate of Heaven" is invented to legitimize the rule of the Middle Kingdom of China through the ages.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 2070 av. J.-C. La Chine est la région la plus orientale où se développe la civilisation humaine. Pendant les dynasties Xia, Shang et Zhou, les villes se concentrent dans les environs du fleuve Jaune, et le concept de Mandat du Ciel est inventé pour légitimer le règne d'un empereur sur le Pays du Milieu.
TEXT.German: It is the year 2070 BC. China is the easternmost region of the world where human civilization first develops. Through the dynasties of Xia, Shang and Zhou, cities develop mainly in the vicinity of the Yellow River, and the concept of a "Mandate of Heaven" is invented to legitimize the rule of the Middle Kingdom of China through the ages.

TEXT.English: It is the year 600 AD. After the Han Dynasty had collapsed, civil war between the Chinese kingdoms ensued. Only 11 years ago Emperor Wen of Sui managed to reunite China and reclaim the Mandate of Heaven. But the power of the Sui Dynasty is not completely consolidated, and the old challenges of China remain.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 600 ap. J.-C. La chute de la dynastie Han a engendré une guerre civile entre les royaumes chinois. Voilà à peine 11 ans que l'empereur Sui Wendi est parvenu à réunifier la Chine et à revendiquer le Mandat du Ciel. Mais la solidité de la dynastie Sui n'est pas complètement établie, et les vieux défis de la Chine sont encore à relever.
TEXT.German: It is the year 600 AD. After the Han Dynasty had collapsed, civil war between the Chinese kingdoms ensued. Only 11 years ago Emperor Wen of Sui managed to reunite China and reclaim the Mandate of Heaven. But the power of the Sui Dynasty is not completely consolidated, and the old challenges of China remain.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. After the Ming Dynasty has collapsed under peasant revolts, the Jurchens of Manchuria have conquered China and established the Qing Dynasty. With Manchuria and Tibet under imperial control, China has reached the greatest extent in history, and the rule of the Kangxi Emperor promises another golden era.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'An 1700 ap. J.-C. Après que des révoltes paysannes ont fait tomber la dynastie Ming, les Jürchen de Mandchourie ont conquis la Chine et établi la dynastie Qing. Avec la Mandchourie et le Tibet sous contrôle impérial, la Chine a atteint sa plus grande ampleur territoriale jusqu'ici. Le règne de l'empereur Kangxi s'annonce comme un nouvel âge d'or.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. After the Ming Dynasty has collapsed under peasant revolts, the Jurchens of Manchuria have conquered China and established the Qing Dynasty. With Manchuria and Tibet under imperial control, China has reached the greatest extent in history, and the rule of the Kangxi Emperor promises another golden era.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1390 AD. The Kingdom of Kongo emerges after the unification of several tribal polities in the Congo delta just when European powers start to expand their influence in Africa. It must try to keep its independence by both religious and economic means.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1390 ap. J.-C. Le royaume du Kongo naît de l'unification de tribus établies dans le delta du fleuve Congo. Au même moment, les Européens commencent à s'intéresser à l'Afrique. Le Kongo devra user de stratégies religieuses et économiques afin de conserver son indépendance.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1390 AD. The Kingdom of Kongo emerges after the unification of several tribal polities in the Congo delta just when European powers start to expand their influence in Africa. It must try to keep its independence by both religious and economic means.
TEXT.Italian: It is the year 1390 AD. The Kingdom of Kongo emerges after the unification of several tribal polities in the Congo delta just when European powers start to expand their influence in Africa. It must try to keep its independence by both religious and economic means.
TEXT.Spanish: It is the year 1390 AD. The Kingdom of Kongo emerges after the unification of several tribal polities in the Congo delta just when European powers start to expand their influence in Africa. It must try to keep its independence by both religious and economic means.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. Continued warfare with the Portuguese and internal rebellions have weakened the Kingdom of Kongo to the point of effective colonization. The kingdom is still lagging behind scientifically and economically, and often the slave trade remains as the only viable source of income.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. La guerre avec les Portugais ainsi que des luttes intestines ont affaibli le royaume du Kongo au point d'en faire essentiellement une colonie. Le royaume accuse un retard sur les plans scientifique et économique, et le commerce des esclaves demeure souvent la seule source fiable de revenu.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. Continued warfare with the Portuguese and internal rebellions have weakened the Kingdom of Kongo to the point of effective colonization. The kingdom is still lagging behind scientifically and economically, and often the slave trade remains as the only viable source of income.

The kingdom is still lagging behind scientifically and economically, and often the slave trade remains as the only viable source of income.

The kingdom is still lagging behind scientifically and economically, and often the slave trade remains as the only viable source of income.

TEXT.English: It is the year 3000 BC. The Egyptian civilization coalesces under the recent unification of the Kingdoms of Lower and Upper Egypt. The fertile banks of the Nile make Egypt one of the wealthiest regions of the world. It is time to use this wealth to build monuments and establish a culture the world has never seen before.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 3000 av. J.-C. Avec l'unification récente des royaumes de Haute-Égypte et de Basse-Égypte, la civilisation égyptienne voit sa puissance consolidée. Les rives fertiles du Nil font de l'Empire l'une des régions les plus prospères du monde. Il est temps d'utiliser cette richesse afin de bâtir des monuments et d'établir une culture distincte de tout ce qu'a connu le monde jusqu'ici.
TEXT.German: It is the year 3000 BC. The Egyptian civilization coalesces under the recent unification of the Kingdoms of Lower and Upper Egypt. The fertile banks of the Nile make Egypt one of the wealthiest regions of the world. It is time to use this wealth to build monuments and establish a culture the world has never seen before.

The fertile banks of the Nile make Egypt one of the wealthiest regions of the world. It is time to use this wealth to build monuments and establish a culture the world has never seen before.

TEXT.English: It is the year 829 AD. After the migration of Germanic peoples to Britain, the island has been divided between several Celtic, Norse and Anglo-Saxon kingdoms. Now the King of Wessex has been crowned Bretwalda and thus ruler of all of England. The newly born England must now ensure their domain, before their rivals manage to summon the unity and power to oppose them.
TEXT.French: It is the year 829 AD. After the migration of Germanic peoples to Britain, the island has been divided between several Celtic, Norse and Anglo-Saxon kingdoms. Now the King of Wessex has been crowned Bretwalda and thus ruler of all of England. The newly born England must now ensure their domain, before their rivals manage to summon the unity and power to oppose them.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. The Glorious Revolution has restored stability to the British thrones and paved the way to the Acts of Union. With its colonial holdings in the Americas and India growing, the British crown will be able to establish a world-wide empire and challenge the French dominance over Europe.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. La Glorieuse Révolution a rétabli la stabilité des trônes anglais et écossais et préparé le terrain pour l'Acte d'Union. Avec la croissance de ses possessions coloniales en Amérique et en Inde, la couronne britannique est maintenant en mesure de créer un empire mondial et de défier la suprématie française en Europe continentale.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. The Glorious Revolution has restored stability to the British thrones and paved the way to the Acts of Union. With its colonial holdings in the Americas and India growing, the British crown will be able to establish a world-wide empire and challenge the French dominance over Europe.

TEXT.English: It is the year 295 BC. The Ethiopian highlands are exceptionally fertile due to its temperate climate, but also quite remote from other civilizations. This changes when the major trade routes between the Roman Empire and Indians shift to the Red Sea, allowing the Ethiopian kingdom of Aksum to flourish.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 295 av. J.-C. Les plateaux d'Éthiopie sont exceptionnellement fertiles grâce à leur climat tempéré, mais ils souffrent de leur éloignement par rapport aux autres civilisations. Cela change lorsque les routes commerciales entre l'Empire romain et l'Inde se déplacent vers la mer Rouge, permettant au royaume éthiopien d'Aksoum de prospérer.
TEXT.German: It is the year 295 BC. The Ethiopian highlands are exceptionally fertile due to its temperate climate, but also quite remote from other civilizations. This changes when the major trade routes between the Roman Empire and Indians shift to the Red Sea, allowing the Ethiopian kingdom of Aksum to flourish.

TEXT.English: It is the year 751 AD. After the collapse of the Western Roman Empire, the Merovingian Frankish Empire became the major Christian power in Europe. With the coronation of Pepin from the Carolingian dynasty, the Franks have come another step closer to reclaim Rome's legacy and dominate Christian Europe.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 751 ap. J.-C. La chute de l'Empire romain d'Occident a permis à l'Empire franc mérovingien de s'imposer comme la principale puissance chrétienne en Europe. Avec le couronnement de Pépin, de la dynastie carolingienne, les Francs sont plus près que jamais de prétendre à la gloire passée de Rome et de dominer la chrétienté.
TEXT.German: It is the year 751 AD. After the collapse of the Western Roman Empire, the Merovingian Frankish Empire became the major Christian power in Europe. With the coronation of Pepin from the Carolingian dynasty, the Franks have come another step closer to reclaim Rome's legacy and dominate Christian Europe.

TEXT.Spanish: It is the year 751 AD. After the collapse of the Western Roman Empire, the Merovingian Frankish Empire became the major Christian power in Europe. With the coronation of Pepin from the Carolingian dynasty, the Franks have come another step closer to reclaim Rome's legacy and dominate Christian Europe.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. France under the rule of Louis XIV is at the height of its power and the dominating cultural and military power in continental Europe. After extending its borders and winning the Thirty Years War, the impeding end of the Spanish Habsburgs presents another opportunity to expand French power.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. Sous Louis XIV, la France est au zénith de sa puissance culturelle et militaire en Europe continentale. Après avoir remporté la Guerre de Trente Ans et agrandi ses frontières, le royaume est prêt à saisir les opportunités que présente la fin de la dynastie des Habsbourg en Espagne.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. France under the rule of Louis XIV is at the height of its power and the dominating cultural and military power in continental Europe. After extending its borders and winning the Thirty Years War, the impeding end of the Spanish Habsburgs presents another opportunity to expand French power.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1701 AD. Since the Westphalian Peace of 1648, the Holy Roman Empire is nothing but a loose organization of states. While the power of the Emperor concentrates in his Austrian holdings, the Electorate of Brandenburg-Prussia elevated itself to the Kingdom of Prussia, seeking to unite the German nation under its own hegemony.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1701 ap. J.-C. Depuis la paix de Westphalie en 1648, le Saint-Empire romain germanique n'est plus qu'une organisation lâche de petits États. Tandis que l'empereur concentre son pouvoir dans ses possessions autrichiennes, l'État de Brandebourg-Prusse obtient le titre de royaume de Prusse. Cette nouvelle puissance cherchera désormais à unir la nation allemande sous sa propre hégémonie.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1701 AD. Since the Westphalian Peace of 1648, the Holy Roman Empire is nothing but a loose organization of states. While the power of the Emperor concentrates in his Austrian holdings, the Electorate of Brandenburg-Prussia elevated itself to the Kingdom of Prussia, seeking to unite the German nation under its own hegemony.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1600 BC. The first city states emerge on the Greek peninsula. While the division of the Greek civilization might seem as a disadvantage at first, their emphasis on independence favors the inception of new ideas in literature, science and philosophy as well as new tactics in the art of warfare.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1600 av. J.-C. Dans la péninsule grecque, les premières cités-États font leur apparition. Si la division de la civilisation grecque peut sembler, à première vue, comme un désavantage, l'indépendance des cités favorise l'émergence de nouvelles idées en littérature, en science et en philosophie ainsi que dans l'art des tactiques militaires.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1600 BC. The first city states emerge on the Greek peninsula. While the division of the Greek civilization might seem as a disadvantage at first, their emphasis on independence favors the inception of new ideas in literature, science and philosophy as well as new tactics in the art of warfare.

TEXT.English: It is the year 3000 BC. The river beds of the Indus and Sarasvati provide fertile ground for ancient civilization. With unparalleled sanitation and urban planning, the Indus Valley Civilization centered around the city of Harappa can make use of this fertility and become the most widespread and populous civilization of its time.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 3000 av. J.-C. Les fleuves Indus et Sarasvati offrent un terrain fertile pour l'émergence d'une civilisation. Avec ses installations sanitaires et ses aménagements urbains sans précédent, la civilisation de la vallée de l'Indus, centrée sur la cité de Harappa, a le potentiel de devenir la culture la plus étendue et la plus peuplée de son temps.
TEXT.German: It is the year 3000 BC. The river beds of the Indus and Sarasvati provide fertile ground for ancient civilization. TEXT.English: It is the year 843 AD. The Treaty of Verdun brings the final separation of the Frankish Empire into West and East Francia. The eastern half is dominated by German peoples, and not only would its German kings break with the Romantic Frankish culture, but also claim its imperial title and the continuation of the Holy Roman Empire.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 843 ap. J.-C. Le Traité de Verdun partage définitivement l'Empire franc en Francie occidentale et Francie orientale. Cette dernière, dominée par des peuples de culture germanique, rompra avec la culture latine de la moitié ouest, mais revendiquera le titre impérial et la continuité du Saint-Empire romain.
TEXT.German: It is the year 843 AD. The Treaty of Verdun brings the final separation of the Frankish Empire into West and East Francia. The eastern half is dominated by German peoples, and not only would its German kings break with the Romantic Frankish culture, but also claim its imperial title and the continuation of the Holy Roman Empire.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. Despite the setbacks during the Thirty Years War, the victory at the Siege of Vienna allowed the Habsburg Monarchy to drive back the Turks and secure their holdings in the Balkans. The beginning of the Austrian baroque let arts and architecture flourish, but the weakness of the Spanish line may lead to another war soon ...
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. Malgré les revers subis pendant la Guerre de Trente Ans, la victoire lors du Siège de Vienne a permis à la monarchie des Habsbourg de repousser l'envahisseur turc et de consolider ses possessions dans les Balkans. Parallèlement, la période baroque en Autriche débute, permettant aux arts et à l'architecture de prospérer. Mais la faiblesse de la lignée espagnole des Habsbourg risque de causer une nouvelle guerre...

TEXT.English: It is the year 1150 AD. Manco Capac has just founded the Kingdom of Cuzco, the first Incan kingdom. Even in the harsh environment of the Andes and lacking suitable pack animals, they set out to create an empire never seen before in the Americas.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en 1150 ap. J.-C. Manco Capac vient de fonder le royaume de Cuzco, le premier État inca. Malgré l'environnement rigoureux des Andes et l'absence d'animaux capables de porter des charges, les Incas entreprennent de créer un empire sans précédent en Amérique.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1150 AD. Manco Capac has just founded the Kingdom of Cuzco, the first Incan kingdom. Even in the harsh environment of the Andes and lacking suitable pack animals, they set out to create an empire never seen before in the Americas.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1500 BC. After the collapse of the Harappan civilization, the Vedic Aryans reach the Indo-Gangetic plain. The following Vedic era features the development of a caste system and the Mahajanapada kingdoms, where the most important epics of Indian culture are authored, laying the foundation to transform India into the religious and spiritual center of the world.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1500 av. J.-C. Après la chute de la civilisation harappéenne, les Aryens atteignent la plaine indo-gangétique. La période védique qui s'ensuit est caractérisée par le développement d'un système de castes et l'établissement des Mahajanapadas, royaumes dans lesquels les épopées les plus importantes de la culture indienne seront écrites. Les fondations de l'Inde en tant que centre religieux et spirituel sont jetées.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1500 BC. After the collapse of the Harappan civilization, the Vedic Aryans reach the Indo-Gangetic plain. The following Vedic era features the development of a caste system and the Mahajanapada kingdoms, where the most important epics of Indian culture are authored, laying the foundation to transform India into the religious and spiritual center of the world.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. Sixteen years ago, Shivaji Bhosle has established the Maratha Kingdom, the first Hindu state to challenge Mughal hegemony over Northern India. With Mughal power declining, now is the time to break Muslim domination of the subcontinent for good.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. Il y a 16 ans, Shivaji Bhonsle a établi le royaume marathe, premier État hindou à contester la suprématie moghole dans le nord de l'Inde. Avec le déclin de l'Empire moghol, il est temps de briser la domination musulmane du sous-continent pour de bon.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. Sixteen years ago, Shivaji Bhosle has established the Maratha Kingdom, the first Hindu state to challenge Mughal hegemony over Northern India. With Mughal power declining, now is the time to break Muslim domination of the subcontinent for good.

TEXT.English: It is the year 650 AD. Nearly all of the trade between China and India passes the Strait of Malacca. Benefiting from its position on the nearby island of Sumatra, the Indonesian Kingdom of Srivijaya rises to become a major trading power in Southeast Asia.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 650 ap. J.-C. Presque tout le commerce entre la Chine et l'Inde passe par le détroit de Malacca. Profitant de sa position avantageuse sur l'île de Sumatra, le royaume indonésien de Sriwijaya est sur le point de devenir une puissance commerciale majeure en Asie du Sud-Est.
TEXT.German: It is the year 650 AD. Nearly all of the trade between China and India passes the Strait of Malacca. Benefiting from its position on the nearby island of Sumatra, the Indonesian Kingdom of Srivijaya rises to become a major trading power in Southeast Asia.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1948 AD. Following decades of Zionist immigration to Palestine, the international community has agreed to partition the region and create a Jewish state. Many challenges await the young Israeli nation, from coexisting with the surrounding Arab populations to growing a tradition of technological and scientific prowess.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1948 ap. J.-C. Après des décennies d'immigration sioniste en Palestine, la communauté internationale s'est entendue pour partitionner la région et créer un État juif. De nombreux défis attendent la jeune nation d'Israël, comme la coexistence avec les populations arabes et l'établissement d'une tradition d'excellence technologique et scientifique.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1948 AD. Following decades of Zionist immigration to Palestine, the international community has agreed to partition the region and create a Jewish state. Many challenges await the young Israeli nation, from coexisting with the surrounding Arab populations to growing a tradition of technological and scientific prowess.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1167 AD. For too long has Italy been under the rule of German kings, but now the Lombard cities have risen up and thanks to Papal support, achieved de facto independence. The Italian city states, though often feuding with each other, are centers of science, culture and commerce and can now reap the benefits of their skills to usher in a Renaissance of European culture.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1167 ap. J.-C. L'Italie a trop longtemps été sous le joug des rois allemands. À présent, les cités lombardes se sont soulevées et, grâce au soutien pontifical, sont parvenues de facto à l'indépendance. Les cités-États italiennes, bien que souvent en conflit entre elles, sont aussi des hauts lieux de la science, de l'art et du commerce, et peuvent désormais récolter le fruit de leurs talents pour inaugurer une Renaissance de la culture européenne.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1167 AD. For too long has Italy been under the rule of German kings, but now the Lombard cities have risen up and thanks to Papal support, achieved de facto independence. The Italian city states, though often feuding with each other, are centers of science, culture and commerce and can now reap the benefits of their skills to usher in a Renaissance of European culture.

TEXT.English: It is the year 525 AD. The early Japanese polity centered around the Yamato province is introduced to Buddhism from Korea. This allows the spread of Chinese influences from the Sui and Tang dynasties to Japan, followed by a centralization of power into the Empire of Japan.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 525 ap. J.-C. Depuis la Corée, le bouddhisme est introduit dans le proto-État japonais de la province de Yamato. Cela ouvre la porte à l'influence culturelle des dynasties chinoise Sui et Tang, menant à une centralisation du pouvoir en un empire du Japon.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. Under the Tokugawa Shogunate, Japan has been at peace for almost a century now. But contact with European traders threatens to disturb the achieved balance again, and even the complete seclusion under the Sakoku cannot preserve it forever. Japan will have to open itself to the world ...
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. Sous le shogunat Tokugawa, le Japon a connu la paix pendant presque un siècle. Mais le contact avec les commerçants européens menace de perturber l'équilibre établi, et la politique d'isolement complet du sakoku ne pourra durer éternellement. Le Japon devra s'ouvrir au reste du monde...
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. Under the Tokugawa Shogunate, Japan has been at peace for almost a century now. But contact with European traders threatens to disturb the achieved balance again, and even the complete seclusion under the Sakoku cannot preserve it forever. Japan will have to open itself to the world ...

TEXT.English: It is the year 800 AD. The unpredictable nature of the South East Asian monsoons have so far prevented the formation of a developed civilization in the region. But now, the advanced Khmer water management techniques lead to the foundation of their capital Angkor, facilitating enormous population growth and urbanization.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 800 ap. J.-C. En Asie du Sud-Est, la nature imprévisible des moussons a jusqu'ici empêché l'émergence d'une civilisation développée. À présent, grâce à leurs techniques avancées en gestion de l'eau, les Khmers fondent leur capitale d'Angkor et voient leur empire s'urbaniser et croître grandement en population.
TEXT.German: It is the year 800 AD. The unpredictable nature of the South East Asian monsoons have so far prevented the formation of a developed civilization in the region. But now, the advanced Khmer water management techniques lead to the foundation of their capital Angkor, facilitating enormous population growth and urbanization.

TEXT.English: It is the year 50 BC. The three Korean kingdoms of Silla, Baekje and Goguryeo form on the Korean peninsula, the first step of centralization of power away from their predecessor chiefdoms. The Chinese are close; Korea will have to have to adapt their more advanced organization without abandoning its own sovereignty.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 50 av. J.-C. Les trois royaumes de Silla, Baekje et Goguryeo se forment sur la péninsule coréenne, ce qui constitue la première étape d'une centralisation des pouvoirs après une ère de confédérations de chefferies. Les Chinois sont proches; la Corée devra s'adapter à leur organisation supérieure sans pour autant compromettre sa propre souveraineté.
TEXT.German: It is the year 50 BC. The three Korean kingdoms of Silla, Baekje and Goguryeo form on the Korean peninsula, the first step of centralization of power away from their predecessor chiefdoms. The Chinese are close; Korea will have to have to adapt their more advanced organization without abandoning its own sovereignty.

TEXT.English: It is the year 600 AD. The three Korean kingdoms still thrive and Goguryeo has expanded the influence of Korean civilization into Manchuria. But now that China is reunited again, they have to be careful to protect their independence for the future.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 600 ap. J.-C. Les trois royaumes de Corée sont prospères, et celui de Goguryeo a même étendu son influence en Mandchourie. Mais maintenant que la Chine s'est réunifiée, les Coréens doivent faire preuve de vigilance s'ils veulent protéger leur indépendance.
TEXT.German: It is the year 600 AD. The three Korean kingdoms still thrive and Goguryeo has expanded the influence of Korean civilization into Manchuria. But now that China is reunited again, they have to be careful to protect their independence for the future.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. The Kingdom of Joseon has faced both invasion from Japan and the Manchu, who now control the entire Chinese Empire. Now a period of relative peace and economic and cultural renaissance has begun, but with two powerful neighbors and Western imperialism on the rise, it can only last for so long ...
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. Le royaume Joseon a résisté à l'invasion japonaise et aux Mandchous, qui contrôlent désormais l'entièreté de l'Empire chinois. Une période de paix relative débute, associée à une renaissance culturelle et économique. Mais avec deux voisins puissants et la montée de l'impérialisme occidental, cela ne pourra pas durer éternellement...
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. The Kingdom of Joseon has faced both invasion from Japan and the Manchu, who now control the entire Chinese Empire. Now a period of relative peace and economic and cultural renaissance has begun, but with two powerful neighbors and Western imperialism on the rise, it can only last for so long ...

TEXT.English: It is the year 969 AD. Under your command, the Fatimid army has conquered Egypt. The land here is rich and people are tired of persecutions from the hands of Sunni governors. The Ismaili Fatimids shall be more welcoming to people of different creeds - their help will be vital in the final battle against the caliphs of Baghdad.
TEXT.French: No Translation
TEXT.German: No Translation
TEXT.Italian: No Translation
TEXT.Spanish: No Translation

TEXT.English: It is the year 989 AD. Sub-Saharan Africa is still underdeveloped compared to the rest of the old world. But the Mande people control rich gold mines, which has caught the attention of its northern neighbors. Defending against foreign attempts to seize its riches by force, Mali has now the opportunity to truly become the richest civilization on Earth.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 989 ap. J.-C. L'Afrique subsaharienne est encore sous-développée par rapport au reste de l'Ancien Monde. Cependant, le peuple mandingue contrôle de riches mines d'or. Cela attire l'attention de ses voisins septentrionaux, aussi le Mali devra-t-il défendre ses ressources s'il veut prétendre au titre de civilisation la plus riche de tous les temps.
TEXT.German: It is the year 989 AD. Sub-Saharan Africa is still underdeveloped compared to the rest of the old world. But the Mande people control rich gold mines, which has caught the attention of its northern neighbors. Defending against foreign attempts to seize its riches by force, Mali has now the opportunity to truly become the richest civilization on Earth.
TEXT.Italian: It is the year 989 AD. Sub-Saharan Africa is still underdeveloped compared to the rest of the old world. But the Mande people control rich gold mines, which has caught the attention of its northern neighbors. Defending against foreign attempts to seize its riches by force, Mali has now the opportunity to truly become the richest civilization on Earth.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1636 AD. Beginning in the 16th century, an Aisin Gioro chief called Nurhaci successfully united the warring Jurchen tribes and proclaimed himself the Khan of the Later Jin, openly renouncing his fealty to the Chinese Ming dynasty. Hong Taiji, the son of Nurhaci, has now declared himself the Emperor of the Great Qing, setting his sights on the Imperial capital of Beijing...
TEXT.French: No Translation
TEXT.German: No Translation
TEXT.Italian: No Translation
TEXT.Spanish: No Translation

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. After the Ming Dynasty collapsed under peasant revolts, the Jurchens of Manchuria conquered China and established the Empire of the Great Qing. With Manchuria and Tibet under imperial control, China has reached its greatest extent in history and the rule of the Kangxi Emperor promises another golden era.
TEXT.French: No Translation
TEXT.German: No Translation
TEXT.Italian: No Translation
TEXT.Spanish: No Translation

TEXT.English: It is the year 400 BC. Urbanization on the peninsula of Yucatan sparks the formation of the Mayan city states, whose technological and architectural advancements would create the first advanced civilization in the Americas.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 400 av. J.-C. L'urbanisation dans la péninsule du Yucatan mène à la formation des cités-États mayas, dont les avancées technologiques et architecturales marqueront l'établissement de la première civilisation avancée en Amérique.
TEXT.German: It is the year 400 BC. Urbanization on the peninsula of Yucatan sparks the formation of the Mayan city states, whose technological and architectural advancements would create the first advanced civilization in the Americas.
TEXT.Italian: It is the year 400 BC. Urbanization on the peninsula of Yucatan sparks the formation of the Mayan city states, whose technological and architectural advancements would create the first advanced civilization in the Americas.
TEXT.Spanish: It is the year 400 BC. Urbanization on the peninsula of Yucatan sparks the formation of the Mayan city states, whose technological and architectural advancements would create the first advanced civilization in the Americas.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1190 AD. For centuries, the peoples of the Mongolian steppe were too divided to pose an actual threat to the world. Now that Temujin has managed to unify all Mongolian tribes under his command, everything has changed, and soon both Orient and Occident will tremble in fear before his armies.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1190 ap. J.-C. Pendant des siècles, les peuples mongols de la steppe eurasienne étaient trop divisés pour poser une menace réelle au reste du monde. Maintenant que Temüjin est parvenu à unifier toutes les tribus mongoles sous son commandement, tout a changé, et tant l'Orient que l'Occident s'apprêtent à trembler de peur à l'approche de ses armées.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1190 AD. For centuries, the peoples of the Mongolian steppe were too divided to pose an actual threat to the world. Now that Temujin has managed to unify all Mongolian tribes under his command, everything has changed, and soon both Orient and Occident will tremble in fear before his armies.
TEXT.Italian: It is the year 1190 AD. For centuries, the peoples of the Mongolian steppe were too divided to pose an actual threat to the world. Now that Temujin has managed to unify all Mongolian tribes under his command, everything has changed, and soon both Orient and Occident will tremble in fear before his armies.

TEXT.English: It is the year 711 AD. The Berbers and Arabs of the Maghreb have crossed the Strait of Gibraltar and defeated the Visigoths to establish the Emirate of Cordoba in Al-Andalus, driving the Iberian Christians to the northern coast of Asturias.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 711 ap. J.-C. Les Berbères et les Arabes du Maghreb ont traversé le détroit de Gibraltar, vaincu les Wisigoths, et fondé l'Émirat de Cordoue en Al-Andalus. La présence chrétienne en Ibérie sera désormais confinée à la côte septentrionale des Asturies.
TEXT.German: It is the year 711 AD. The Berbers and Arabs of the Maghreb have crossed the Strait of Gibraltar and defeated the Visigoths to establish the Emirate of Cordoba in Al-Andalus, driving the Iberian Christians to the northern coast of Asturias.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1206 AD. Although Muslim rulers have occasionally raided India for centuries, the foundation of the Delhi Sultanate by Muhammad of Ghor marks the establishment of Islam as a political power on the subcontinent. Their successors, including the Muslim Mughal dynasty, would spread their faith all over India and erect its greatest architectural wonders since ancient times.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1206 ap. J.-C. Bien que des souverains musulmans fassent occasionnellement des incursions en Inde depuis des siècles, c'est la fondation du Sultanat de Delhi par Muhammad Ghûrî qui marque l'implantation de l'islam comme puissance politique dans le sous-continent. Les successeurs du sultanat, y compris la dynastie moghole, propageront la foi musulmane partout à travers l'Inde et érigeront des merveilles architecturales sans égales depuis l'Antiquité.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1206 AD. Although Muslim rulers have occasionally raided India for centuries, the foundation of the Delhi Sultanate by Muhammad of Ghor marks the establishment of Islam as a political power on the subcontinent. Their successors, including the Muslim Mughal dynasty, would spread their faith all over India and erect its greatest architectural wonders since ancient times.

Their successors, including the Muslim Mughal dynasty, would spread their faith all over India and erect its greatest architectural wonders since ancient times.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. The Mughal Empire has reached its zenith. While culture and architecture are still thriving, Mughal hegemony over India is threatened by the emergence of a sovereign Hindu state in the Marathas and the gains of various European powers on India's coasts.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. L'Empire moghol a atteint son zénith. L'architecture et la vie culturelle y sont prospères, mais l'hégémonie moghole sur le sous-continent est menacée par l'émergence d'un État hindou chez les Marathes et par les gains coloniaux des puissances européennes sur les côtes de l'Inde.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. The Mughal Empire has reached its zenith. While culture and architecture are still thriving, Mughal hegemony over India is threatened by the emergence of a sovereign Hindu state in the Marathas and the gains of various European powers on India's coasts.
TEXT.Italian: It is the year 1700 AD. The Mughal Empire has reached its zenith. While culture and architecture are still thriving, Mughal hegemony over India is threatened by the emergence of a sovereign Hindu state in the Marathas and the gains of various European powers on India's coasts.
TEXT.Spanish: It is the year 1700 AD. The Mughal Empire has reached its zenith. While culture and architecture are still thriving, Mughal hegemony over India is threatened by the emergence of a sovereign Hindu state in the Marathas and the gains of various European powers on India's coasts.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1581 AD. Situated at the confluence of Europe's most important trade routes, the Netherlands are the most populated and wealthiest region of the continent. Far too long this wealth has gone to foreign powers, but now, after long wars, the Dutch people have finally reached independence and established a Republic.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en 1581 ap. J.-C. Situés au confluent des routes commerciales les plus importantes d'Europe, les Pays-Bas sont la région la plus peuplée et la plus riche du continent. Cette abondance a trop longtemps profité à des puissances étrangères, mais aujourd'hui, après de longues guerres, le peuple néerlandais est parvenu à l'indépendance en fondant une République.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1581 AD. Situated at the confluence of Europe's most important trade routes, the Netherlands are the most populated and wealthiest region of the continent. Far too long this wealth has gone to foreign powers, but now, after long wars, the Dutch people have finally reached independence and established a Republic.
TEXT.Italian: It is the year 1581 AD. Situated at the confluence of Europe's most important trade routes, the Netherlands are the most populated and wealthiest region of the continent. Far too long this wealth has gone to foreign powers, but now, after long wars, the Dutch people have finally reached independence and established a Republic.
TEXT.Spanish: It is the year 1581 AD. Situated at the confluence of Europe's most important trade routes, the Netherlands are the most populated and wealthiest region of the continent. Far too long this wealth has gone to foreign powers, but now, after long wars, the Dutch people have finally reached independence and established a Republic.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. Since their independence at the end of the Eighty Years war, the Netherlands have entered a Golden Age and become the European center of trade, industry, culture and science. This wealth however has created envy in the rising neighboring powers of France and Great Britain, and the Dutch will need to keep their colonial empire together to maintain their wealth.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. Depuis leur indépendance obtenue à la fin de la Guerre de Quatre-Vingts Ans, les Pays-Bas ont traversé un âge d'or et sont devenus le centre européen du commerce, de l'industrie, des arts et des sciences. Cette richesse suscite toutefois l'envie des puissances voisines telles que la France et la Grande-Bretagne, et les Néerlandais devront compter sur leur empire colonial afin de maintenir leur statut.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. Since their independence at the end of the Eighty Years war, the Netherlands have entered a Golden Age and become the European center of trade, industry, culture and science. This wealth however has created envy in the rising neighboring powers of France and Great Britain, and the Dutch will need to keep their colonial empire together to maintain their wealth.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1280 AD. After the collapse of the Seljuk Empire, the Anatolian Turks are divided into several small Beyliks. However, Byzantium is weakened itself, and now that the Osmanli Beylik is in the hands of a strong leader, a Turkish Ottoman Empire seems close. With the Bosphorus right within their grasp, they have the opportunity to form an empire that stretches over three continents.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1280 ap. J.-C. Depuis l'effondrement de l'Empire seldjoukide, les Turcs d'Anatolie sont divisés en plusieurs petits beyliks. Or, Byzance est faible, et comme le Beylik ottoman est dirigé par un chef fort, la fondation d'un empire semble à portée de main. En prenant le Bosphore, les Ottomans auront l'opportunité d'étendre leur domination sur trois continents.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1280 AD. After the collapse of the Seljuk Empire, the Anatolian Turks are divided into several small Beyliks. However, Byzantium is weakened itself, and now that the Osmanli Beylik is in the hands of a strong leader, a Turkish Ottoman Empire seems close. With the Bosphorus right within their grasp, they have the opportunity to form an empire that stretches over three continents.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. With the defeat at the Siege of Vienna, the military expansion of the Ottoman Empire has come to an end and it is on the defensive against the growing power of Austria and Russia. This change in the balance of power leads to increased cultural contact and exchange with the Europeans and a flowering of Ottoman culture.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. La défaite lors du siège de Vienne a mis fin à l'expansion militaire de l'Empire ottoman, qui se retrouve sur la défensive face à l'Autriche et à la Russie. Ces changements dans la balance du pouvoir provoquent toutefois des échanges culturels avec les Européens et la floraison de la culture ottomane.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. With the defeat at the Siege of Vienna, the military expansion of the Ottoman Empire has come to an end and it is on the defensive against the growing power of Austria and Russia. This change in the balance of power leads to increased cultural contact and exchange with the Europeans and a flowering of Ottoman culture.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1180 AD. While living there for centuries, the people of the region have only just begun to unify, under the sixteen clans in the city-state of Ife. The newly united Yoruba people are now ready to spread their culture, urbanism, and wisdom from the banks of the river Niger to the coast of the Gulf of Guinea.
TEXT.French: No Translation
TEXT.German: No Translation
TEXT.Italian: No Translation
TEXT.Spanish: No Translation

TEXT.English: It is the year 844 BC. Persia has always been home to warlike peoples, but now the Achaemenid dynasty provides them with the unifying force to form an organized empire. While the Persian plateau is not particularly wealthy, it has rich and defenseless neighbors in India in the east and Mesopotamia in the west to conquer on their way to become the world's greatest empire.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 844 av. J.-C. La Perse a toujours été habitée par des peuples guerriers, mais c'est la fondation de la dynastie achéménide qui leur donne l'impulsion nécessaire pour s'unifier et former un empire organisé. Bien que le plateau iranien ne soit pas particulièrement fertile, la Mésopotamie à l'ouest et l'Inde à l'est sont riches et mal défendues. Il n'en tient qu'aux Perses de les conquérir afin de devenir le plus grand empire du monde.
TEXT.German: It is the year 844 BC. Persia has always been home to warlike peoples, but now the Achaemenid dynasty provides them with the unifying force to form an organized empire. While the Persian plateau is not particularly wealthy, it has rich and defenseless neighbors in India in the east and Mesopotamia in the west to conquer on their way to become the world's greatest empire.

While the Persian plateau is not particularly wealthy, it has rich and defenseless neighbors in India in the east and Mesopotamia in the west to conquer on their way to become the world's greatest empire.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. The Safavid Dynasty, which has ruled Persia since 1500 AD, is losing authority over its territory. The time is ripe for a competent warlord to seize control and humiliate the neighboring Turks, Uzbeks and Mughals ...
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. La dynastie séfévide, qui dirige la Perse depuis l'an 1500, est en perte d'autorité. Le fruit est mûr pour qu'un seigneur de guerre prenne le contrôle du pays et humilie ses voisins turcs, ouzbeks et moghols.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. The Safavid Dynasty, which has ruled Persia since 1500 AD, is losing authority over its territory. The time is ripe for a competent warlord to seize control and humiliate the neighboring Turks, Uzbeks and Mughals ...

TEXT.English: It is the year 900 AD. All across the archipelago polities are beginning to rise, spurred by its position on the trade routes between India and China. While culturally influenced by these two great regions, the archipelago is also home to a strong tradition of its own. One of the first polities to rise is Tondo. Surrounded on all sides by water, is especially well-placed to command an influential role across the entirety of Luzon and beyond.
TEXT.French: No Translation
TEXT.German: No Translation
TEXT.Italian: No Translation
TEXT.Spanish: No Translation

TEXT.English: It is the year 1200 BC. Foreign invasions have weakened the Mesopotamian kingdoms, allowing the Phoenician city states to achieve independence. With the neighboring lands dominated by more powerful civilizations, the Phoenicians have turned their eyes to the west, seeing the opportunity to gain wealth by trade on the Mediterranean Sea.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1200 av. J.-C. Des invasions étrangères ont affaibli les royaumes de Mésopotamie, ce qui a permis aux cités phéniciennes d'accéder à l'indépendance. Comme les contrées environnantes sont dominées par des civilisations puissantes, les Phéniciens tournent leur regard vers l'ouest, voyant dans la mer Méditerranée une opportunité de s'enrichir par le commerce.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1200 BC. Foreign invasions have weakened the Mesopotamian kingdoms, allowing the Phoenician city states to achieve independence. With the neighboring lands dominated by more powerful civilizations, the Phoenicians have turned their eyes to the west, seeing the opportunity to gain wealth by trade on the Mediterranean Sea.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1025 AD. After the Christianization of the West Slavs in 966, the first Polish ruler is coronated as king. Fertile lands promise urban growth, while pagan neighbors to the north and declining Orthodox polities to the east offer opportunities for expansion.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1025 ap. J.-C. Après la conversion au christianisme des Slaves occidentaux en 966, le duc de Pologne est aujourd'hui couronné comme premier roi. Des terres fertiles promettent une croissance urbaine forte, tandis que les voisins païens au nord et le déclin des États orthodoxes à l'est offrent des opportunités d'expansion.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1025 AD. After the Christianization of the West Slavs in 966, the first Polish ruler is coronated as king. Fertile lands promise urban growth, while pagan neighbors to the north and declining Orthodox polities to the east offer opportunities for expansion.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. Cossack uprisings and the Swedish deluge have severely weakened the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth, and the decentralized political system is incapable of reform. Encircled by the growing powers of Prussia, Austria and Russia, the very independence of Poland is in danger ...
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. Les soulèvements cosaques d'une part, et le Déluge suédois de l'autre, ont grandement affaibli la république des Deux Nations, dont le système politique décentralisé s'avère peu propice aux réformes. Les puissances montantes que sont la Prusse, l'Autriche et la Russie menacent l'indépendance même de la Pologne...
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. Cossack uprisings and the Swedish deluge have severely weakened the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth, and the decentralized political system is incapable of reform. Encircled by the growing powers of Prussia, Austria and Russia, the very independence of Poland is in danger ...

TEXT.English: It is the year 1000 BC. Polynesian settlers have migrated to the Tongan and Samoan islands. With their exceptional navigational skills, they can reach and settle even the most isolated islands in the South Pacific Ocean around them.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes an l'an 1000 av. J.-C. Les Polynésiens se sont installés dans les Tonga et les Samoa. Avec leur talent exceptionnel pour la navigation, ils peuvent atteindre et coloniser jusqu'aux îles les plus reculées de l'océan Pacifique.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1000 BC. Polynesian settlers have migrated to the Tongan and Samoan islands. With their exceptional navigational skills, they can reach and settle even the most isolated islands in the South Pacific Ocean around them.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1128 AD. Portugal has just defeated Spain and gained independence. Situated at the western end of Europe, the kingdom is in an excellent position to send ships to ports all over the world and control the trade of all of Europe, Africa and Asia.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1128 ap. J.-C. Luttant à la fois contre les royaumes espagnols et les musulmans, le Portugal parvient à établir son indépendance. Sa situation à l'extrémité occidentale de l'Europe place le royaume dans la position idéale pour envoyer des navires partout dans le monde et contrôler le commerce entre l'Europe, l'Afrique et l'Asie.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1128 AD. Portugal has just defeated Spain and gained independence. Situated at the western end of Europe, the kingdom is in an excellent position to send ships to ports all over the world and control the trade of all of Europe, Africa and Asia.

TEXT.Spanish: It is the year 1128 AD. Portugal has just defeated Spain and gained independence. Situated at the western end of Europe, the kingdom is in an excellent position to send ships to ports all over the world and control the trade of all of Europe, Africa and Asia.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. In the last century, Portugal has regained its independence from the Spanish crown. Many of its colonial possessions have been lost to the Dutch, but Brazil is still under Portuguese control and promises wealth for the future.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. Durant le dernier siècle, le Portugal a regagné son indépendance de la couronne espagnole. De nombreuses possessions coloniales ont été perdues aux mains des Pays-Bas, mais le Brésil demeure sous domination portugaise et promet la prospérité.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. In the last century, Portugal has regained its independence from the Spanish crown. Many of its colonial possessions have been lost to the Dutch, but Brazil is still under Portuguese control and promises wealth for the future.

TEXT.Spanish: It is the year 1700 AD. In the last century, Portugal has regained its independence from the Spanish crown. Many of its colonial possessions have been lost to the Dutch, but Brazil is still under Portuguese control and promises wealth for the future.

TEXT.English: It is the year 753 BC. The Latin people have just founded the city of Rome. Situated at a favorable position and governed by a superior political system, it is fated to control the whole Italian peninsula. Most of its neighboring regions in Europe are still barbaric and uncivilized. The city of Carthage is its only rival on the way to rule and civilize the whole Mediterranean.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 753 av. J.-C. Les Latins viennent de fonder la ville de Rome. Sa situation géographique et son système politique supérieur destinent la cité à dominer toute la péninsule italienne. Les régions avoisinantes en Europe sont encore barbares et peu civilisées, et la cité de Carthage est la seule vraie rivale de Rome pour le contrôle de toute la Méditerranée.
TEXT.German: It is the year 753 BC. The Latin people have just founded the city of Rome. Situated at a favorable position and governed by a superior political system, it is fated to control the whole Italian peninsula. Most of its neighboring regions in Europe are still barbaric and uncivilized. The city of Carthage is its only rival on the way to rule and civilize the whole Mediterranean.
TEXT.Italian: It is the year 753 BC. The Latin people have just founded the city of Rome. Situated at a favorable position and governed by a superior political system, it is fated to control the whole Italian peninsula. Most of its neighboring regions in Europe are still barbaric and uncivilized. The city of Carthage is its only rival on the way to rule and civilize the whole Mediterranean.
TEXT.Spanish: It is the year 753 BC. The Latin people have just founded the city of Rome. Situated at a favorable position and governed by a superior political system, it is fated to control the whole Italian peninsula. Most of its neighboring regions in Europe are still barbaric and uncivilized. The city of Carthage is its only rival on the way to rule and civilize the whole Mediterranean.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1283 AD...
TEXT.French: It is the year 1283 AD...
TEXT.German: It is the year 1283 AD...
TEXT.Italian: It is the year 1283 AD..
TEXT.Spanish: It is the year 1283 AD...

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. Under the rule of Peter the Great Russia is on the path of modernization. Sweden has just been defeated and the foundation of Sankt-Peterburg secured a window to the west for Russia. With the advance into Siberia, the Russian Empire is now the largest in the world.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. Sous le règne de Pierre le Grand, la Russie est sur la voie de la modernisation. À l'ouest, la Suède vient d'être vaincue, et la fondation de Saint-Pétersbourg a solidifié le contrôle de la région. À l'est, la colonisation de la Sibérie fait de l'Empire russe le plus grand au monde.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. Under the rule of Peter the Great Russia is on the path of modernization. Sweden has just been defeated and the foundation of Sankt-Peterburg secured a window to the west for Russia. With the advance into Siberia, the Russian Empire is now the largest in the world.

Sweden has just been defeated and the foundation of Sankt-Peterburg secured a window to the west for Russia. With the advance into Siberia, the Russian Empire is now the largest in the world.

TEXT.English: It is the year 718 AD. Arabs from the Ummayad Caliphate have overrun almost all of Iberia and put an end to Visigoth rule. Now the Spanish Kingdom of Asturias is founded in the mountainous north, seeking to restore Christian control over Iberia and expand it beyond.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 718 ap. J.-C. Les Arabes du Califat omeyyade ont pris le contrôle de presque toute la péninsule ibérique et mis fin au règne des Wisigoths. Le royaume espagnol des Asturies se forme dans le nord montagneux. Il devra d'abord restaurer la domination chrétienne sur la péninsule avant de l'étendre bien au-delà.
TEXT.German: It is the year 718 AD. Arabs from the Ummayad Caliphate have overrun almost all of Iberia and put an end to Visigoth rule. Now the Spanish Kingdom of Asturias is founded in the mountainous north, seeking to restore Christian control over Iberia and expand it beyond.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. The Spanish Empire is in a state of decline. Income from the American colonies is diminishing, the cultural flourishing of the last century has come to an end, and now the ruling Habsburg dynasty is about to die out. The conflict over the Spanish succession is about to consume Europe ...
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. L'Empire espagnol est en déclin. Les revenus tirés des colonies en Amérique diminuent, l'âge d'or culturel du siècle dernier a pris fin, et la dynastie des Habsbourg est sur le point de s'éteindre. La succession d'Espagne va provoquer un conflit qui risque d'embraser l'Europe...
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. The Spanish Empire is in a state of decline. Income from the American colonies is diminishing, the cultural flourishing of the last century has come to an end, and now the ruling Habsburg dynasty is about to die out. The conflict over the Spanish succession is about to consume Europe ...

TEXT.English: It is 1523 AD. A couple years after the outrages of the Stockholm Bloodbath, committed by the Danish king Kristian the Tyrant. You, Gustav Vasa, have lead a rebellion since to restore independence, successfully uniting Sweden under a hereditary monarchy.
TEXT.French: No Translation
TEXT.German: No Translation
TEXT.Italian: No Translation
TEXT.Spanish: No Translation

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. The Kingdom of Sweden is the most formidable of the Scandinavian powers and has managed to establish an empire by acquiring Finland. Still, its expansion has also created enemies, and rivals like Denmark-Norway, Poland and especially Russia might seek to curb Swedish power...

It is the year 960 AD. For generations the East Coast of Africa has been visited by Persian and Arabic traders from the Islamic world, giving rise to a uniquely mixed culture. Now, with the purchase of the highly defensible island of Kilwa from the inland dwellers, the Swahili traders are ready to control the trade of the entire Indian ocean, and maybe even beyond...
TEXT.French: No Translation
TEXT.German: No Translation

TEXT.Spanish: No Translation

TEXT.English: It is the year 300 BC. With the development of their Sangam literature, the Tamil culture rises to the south of India. Their position close to both China and Rome as well as the availability of valuable spices have made the local dynasties of the Cheras, Pandyans and Cholas affluent centers of trade.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 300 av. J.-C. Avec le développement de la littérature Sangam, la culture tamoule prend son envol dans le sud de l'Inde. Situées à mi-chemin entre la Chine et Rome, et disposant de précieuses épices, les dynasties locales de Chera, de Pandya et de Chola sont des hauts lieux du commerce.
TEXT.German: It is the year 300 BC. With the development of their Sangam literature, the Tamil culture rises to the south of India. Their position close to both China and Rome as well as the availability of valuable spices have made the local dynasties of the Cheras, Pandyans and Cholas affluent centers of trade.

TEXT.English: It is the year 600 AD...

It is the year 1700 AD. Since the decline of the Vijayanagara Empire in the 16th century, the Kingdom of Mysore has been the dominant power in the southern Deccan, resisting Mughal expansion. With the appearance of the Marathas and the British, the power structure in India has shifted, requiring Mysore to defend its sovereignty again.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. Depuis le déclin du royaume de Vijayanâgara au 16e siècle, le royaume de Mysore, qui a résisté à l'expansion moghole, est la principale puissance dans le sud du Deccan. L'émergence des Marathes et l'apparition des Britanniques ont toutefois bouleversé la structure politique de l'Inde. Mysore devra à nouveau défendre sa souveraineté.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. Since the decline of the Vijayanagara Empire in the 16th century, the Kingdom of Mysore has been the dominant power in the southern Deccan, resisting Mughal expansion. With the appearance of the Marathas and the British, the power structure in India has shifted, requiring Mysore to defend its sovereignty again.

TEXT.English: It is the year 200 BC. While the Valley of Mexico has been inhabited for thousands of years, advanced civilization thus far has only flourished East, in the Olmec, Zapotec, and Maya heartlands. Now urban centers are developing around Lake Texcoco. The most prominent is Teotihuacan, poised to influence the culture of all Mesoamerica.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 200 av. J.-C. Bien que la vallée de Mexico soit habitée depuis des milliers d'années, des civilisations avancées ne se sont jusqu'ici dévelopées qu'à l'est, chez les Olmèques, les Zapotèques et les Mayas. Maintenant, des cités apparaissent autour du lac Texcoco. L'une d'elles, Teotihuacan, est destinée à influencer la culture de toute la Mésoamérique.
TEXT.German: It is the year 200 BC. While the Valley of Mexico has been inhabited for thousands of years, advanced civilization thus far has only flourished East, in the Olmec, Zapotec, and Maya heartlands. TEXT.English: It is the year 1350 AD. The collapse of the Khmer Empire has allowed the Thai people to claim hegemony over South East Asia. They were able to raze the Khmer capital of Angkor and found their own kingdom west of it, in Ayutthaya.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1350 ap. J.-C. La chute de l'Empire khmer a permis au peuple thaï de revendiquer le contrôle de l'Asie du Sud-Est. Les Thaïs ont rasé la capitale khmère, Angkor, et fondé leur nouveau royaume à l'ouest, à Ayutthaya.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1350 AD. The collapse of the Khmer Empire has allowed the Thai people to claim hegemony over South East Asia. They were able to raze the Khmer capital of Angkor and found their own kingdom west of it, in Ayutthaya.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. With excellent relations with the new European powers in South Asia and controlling one of the largest cities in the world, the Kingdom of Ayutthaya is in an advantageous condition. However, the threat from their Burmese neighbors is beginning to grow and even the Europeans might consider colonization ...
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. Le royaume d'Ayutthaya bénéficie d'excellentes relations avec les Européens établis en Asie, et contrôle l'une des villes les plus peuplées du monde. Cette posture avantageuse est toutefois menacée par le voisin birman, ainsi que par la possibilité d'une expansion coloniale européenne...
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. With excellent relations with the new European powers in South Asia and controlling one of the largest cities in the world, the Kingdom of Ayutthaya is in an advantageous condition. However, the threat from their Burmese neighbors is beginning to grow and even the Europeans might consider colonization ...

TEXT.English: It is the year 630 AD. The Tibetan clans around Lhasa have been united, and the current weakness of the neighboring Chinese Tang and Indian Pala empires opens the opportunity to expand your empire from the Tibetan highlands and spread Buddhist teaching in the whole world.
TEXT.French: Nous sommmes en l'an 630 ap. J.-C. Les clans tibétains des environs de Lhasa viennent de s'unir. La faiblesse des empires Tang en Chine et Pala en Inde ouvre la porte à une expansion au-delà des plateaux du Tibet, et à la propagation de l'enseignement bouddhiste à travers le monde.
TEXT.German: It is the year 630 AD. The Tibetan clans around Lhasa have been united, and the current weakness of the neighboring Chinese Tang and Indian Pala empires opens the opportunity to expand your empire from the Tibetan highlands and spread Buddhist teaching in the whole world.

TEXT.English: It is the year 554 AD. After throwing off their domination by the Rouran Khaganate, the Turks have taken control of the Central Asian steppes. Both China and the Middle East are open for raids and conquests, and the Silk Road promises vast riches to whoever controls it.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 554 ap. J.-C. Longtemps dominés par le Khaganat Ruanruan, les Turcs ont pris le contrôle des steppes d'Asie centrale. La Chine et le Moyen-Orient constituent des cibles de choix pour des raids ou la conquête, et la route de la soie promet une grande richesse à celui qui la contrôle.
TEXT.German: It is the year 554 AD. After throwing off their domination by the Rouran Khaganate, the Turks have taken control of the Central Asian steppes. Both China and the Middle East are open for raids and conquests, and the Silk Road promises vast riches to whoever controls it.

TEXT.English: It is the year 1700 AD. After the rise of the Safavid Empire, the power of the Timurids as the eminent Turkic power in the Middle East has been broken. Afterwards, Uzbek tribes have invaded Transoxiana and captured its wealthy cities, establishing the Khanate of Bukhara.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 1700 ap. J.-C. Avec la montée de la dynastie séfévide, la domination des Timourides en tant que principal empire turc au Moyen-Orient est chose du passé. Depuis, des tribus ouzbèkes ont envahi la Transoxiane et capturé ses cités prospères, établissant ainsi le khanat de Boukhara.
TEXT.German: It is the year 1700 AD. After the rise of the Safavid Empire, the power of the Timurids as the eminent Turkic power in the Middle East has been broken. Afterwards, Uzbek tribes have invaded Transoxiana and captured its wealthy cities, establishing the Khanate of Bukhara.

TEXT.English: It's the year 257 BC. Your people live a peaceful life at the Red River delta, but conquerers from the north calling themselves the Sons of Heaven threaten to end this lifestyle once and for all. It is your duty to not only fend off these arrivists, but also build an empire that outshines everthing that has ever been.
TEXT.French: No Translation
TEXT.German: No Translation
TEXT.Italian: No Translation
TEXT.Spanish: No Translation

TEXT.English: It is the year 551 AD. The scarcity of food makes the inhabitants of Scandinavia excellent sailors that rely on fishing and trade. Their home kingdoms still can't sustain further population growth, and the Vikings have to turn to lands across the sea. Not only the coasts of the North Sea, but also the Mediterranean and even the New World make good targets for plunder or settlement.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes en l'an 551 ap. J.-C. La rareté de la nourriture en Scandinavie a fait de ses habitants d'excellents marins, qui comptent avant tout sur la pêche et le commerce. Comme leurs royaumes ne peuvent supporter une plus grande croissance démographique, les Vikings se tournent vers les terres au-delà des mers. Les côtes de la mer du Nord, mais aussi celles de la Méditerranée et même du Nouveau Monde, seront la cible de pillage et de peuplement.
TEXT.German: It is the year 551 AD. The scarcity of food makes the inhabitants of Scandinavia excellent sailors that rely on fishing and trade. Not only the coasts of the North Sea, but also those of the Mediterranean and even the New World make good targets for either plunder or settlement.
